official_title: A bill to exempt range sheep industry mobile housing and temporary range cattle camps from regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers.

summary.text: Exempts range sheep industry mobile housing and temporary range cattle camps from regulations affecting permanent housing for agricultural workers.
